Package org.blockchainnative.fabric

Interface FabricContractApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FabricContractApiImpl
    public interface FabricContractApi
    Wraps the calls to the Hyperledger Fabric SDK for a given contract.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createChaincodeEventObservable

        io.reactivex.Observable<Event<java.lang.String>> createChaincodeEventObservable​(java.lang.String eventName)
        Creates an observable for a given event.
        Parameters:
        eventName - name of the Hyperledger Fabric chaincode event
        Returns:
        raw event observable

      • installChaincode

        void installChaincode​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> targetPeerNames,
                      org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.User user)
        Installs a the chaincode on given peers.
        Parameters:
        targetPeerNames - peers to install the chaincode on.
        If null, the peers registered in FabricContractInfo are used. If those are set as well, the chaincode is installed on all peers known to the channel
        user - user context to be used. If null the clients user context is used.
        NOTE: Make sure that the user has correct permissions to install chaincode on the target peers.

      • instantiateChaincode

        void instantiateChaincode​(java.lang.String[] arguments,
                          java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> targetPeerNames,
                          org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.User user)
        Instantiates the chaincode.
        Make sure to install the chaincode on all target peers before calling instantiate.
        Parameters:
        arguments - chaincode init arguments
        targetPeerNames - peers to instantiate the chaincode on.
        If null, the peers registered in FabricContractInfo are used. If those are set as well, the chaincode is installed on all peers known to the channel
        user - user context to be used. If null the clients user context is used.
        NOTE: Make sure that the user has correct permissions to submit an instantiate transaction to the orderer.

      • callChaincode

        Result<java.lang.String> callChaincode​(java.lang.String functionName,
                                       java.lang.String[] arguments,
                                       java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> targetPeerNames,
                                       org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.User user)
        Executes a chaincode function in a transaction.
        Parameters:
        functionName - name of the function to be executed
        arguments - function arguments
        targetPeerNames - peers to target with the function call.
        If null, the peers registered in FabricContractInfo are used. If those are set as well, the chaincode is installed on all peers known to the channel
        user - user context to be used. If null the clients user context is used.
        Returns:
        raw function result

      • queryChaincode

        Result<java.lang.String> queryChaincode​(java.lang.String functionName,
                                        java.lang.String[] arguments,
                                        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> targetPeerNames,
                                        org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.User user)
        Executes a chaincode function without submitting a transaction.
        Parameters:
        functionName - name of the function to be executed
        arguments - function arguments
        targetPeerNames - peers to target with the function call.
        If null, the peers registered in FabricContractInfo are used. If those are set as well, the chaincode is installed on all peers known to the channel
        user - user context to be used. If null the clients user context is used.
        Returns:
        raw function result

      • setContractInfo

        void setContractInfo​(FabricContractInfo<?> contractInfo)
        Sets the FabricContractInfo the FabricContractApi operates on
        Parameters:
        contractInfo - FabricContractInfo
